title: Swiss roll with homemade raspberry jam
description: This no-fuss jam recipe is quicker and easier to make than traditional jam and works a treat in a Swiss roll.For this recipe you will need a 38x25cm/15x10in Swiss roll tin.
ingredients: 125g/4½oz caster sugar, plus extra for dusting
2 vanilla pods, split, seeds scraped out using the tip of a sharp knife
8 tiny sprigs fresh mint or lemon verbena, for the garnish
1 tbsp chopped pistachios, for the garnish (optional)
